rnalysis.enrichment.venn_diagramÔÉÅ

rnalysis.enrichment.venn_diagram(objs: Dict[str, Union[str, FeatureSet, Set[str]]], title: Union[str, Literal['default']] = 'default', attr_ref_table_path: Union[str, Path, Literal['predefined']] = 'predefined', set_colors: Iterable[str] = ('r', 'g', 'b'), transparency: float = 0.4, weighted: bool = True, add_outline: bool = True, linecolor: str = 'black', linestyle: Literal['solid', 'dashed'] = 'solid', linewidth: float = 2.0, title_fontsize: int = 14, set_fontsize: int = 12, subset_fontsize: int = 10, normalize_to: float = 1.0, fig: Optional[Figure] = None)ÔÉÅ

Generate a Venn diagram of 2 to 3 sets, FeatureSets or attributes from the Attribute Reference Table.

Parameters

  • objs (a dictionary with 2-3 entries, where the keys are the names of the sets, and the values are either a FeatureSet, a python set of feature indices, or a name of a column in the Attribute Reference Table. For example: {'first set':{'gene1','gene2','gene3'}, 'second set':'name_of_attribute_from_reference_table'}) ‚Äì the FeatureSets, python sets or user-defined attributes to plot.

  • set_colors (tuple of matplotlib-format colors, the same size as 'objs') ‚Äì determines the colors of the circles in the diagram.

  • attr_ref_table_path (str or pathlib.Path (default='predefined')) ‚Äì the path of the Attribute Reference Table from which user-defined attributes will be drawn, if such attributes are included in ‚Äòobjs‚Äô.

  • title (str or 'default' (default='default')) ‚Äì determines the title of the plot.

  • transparency (a float between 0 and 1) ‚Äì determines the opacity of the circles. Opacity of 0 is completely transparent, while opacity of 1 is completely opaque.

  • weighted (bool (default=True)) ‚Äì if True, the plot will be area-weighted.

  • add_outline (bool (default=True)) ‚Äì if True, adds an outline to the circles.

  • linecolor (matplotlib-format color (default='black')) ‚Äì Determines the color of the circles‚Äô outline.

  • linestyle ('solid' or 'dashed' (default='solid')) ‚Äì the style of the circles‚Äô outline.

  • linewidth (float (default=2.0)) ‚Äì the widdth of the circles‚Äô outlines.

  • title_fontsize (int (default=14)) ‚Äì font size for the plot‚Äôs title.

  • set_fontsize (int (default=12)) ‚Äì font size for the set labels.

  • subset_fontsize (int (default=10)) ‚Äì font size for the subset labels.

  • fig (matplotlib.Figure) ‚Äì optionally, supply your own Figure to generate the plot onto.

  • normalize_to ‚Äì the total (on-axes) area of the circles to be drawn. Sometimes tuning it (together

with the overall fiture size) may be useful to fit the text labels better. :type normalize_to: float (default=1.0) :return: a tuple of a VennDiagram object; and a list of 2-3 Circle patches.
